org.grouplens.lenskit

Interface GlobalItemScorer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ItemItemModelBackedGlobalScorer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGlobalItemScorer, ItemItemGlobalScorer

    public interface GlobalItemScorer
    Score items for given item(s). These scores can be predicted relevance scores, purchase probabilities, or any other real-valued score which can be assigned to an item for a given item.
    Since:
    0.10

    Compatibility: Public

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SparseVector globalScore(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
      Score a collection of items based on a collection of items(a shopping basket).
      double globalScore(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems, long item)
      Score a single item based on a collection of items(a shopping basket).
      void globalScore(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems, MutableSparseVector output)
      Score items in a vector based on a collection of items (a shopping basket).

    • Method Detail

      • globalScore

        double globalScore(@Nonnull
                 java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems,
                 long item)
        Score a single item based on a collection of items(a shopping basket).
        Parameters:
        queryItems - The objective items ID used as the query
        item - The item ID to score.
        Returns:
        The preference, or Double.NaN if no preference can be predicted.

      • globalScore

        @Nonnull
SparseVector globalScore(@Nonnull
                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems,
                               @Nonnull
                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Score a collection of items based on a collection of items(a shopping basket).
        Parameters:
        queryItems - The objective items ID used as the query
        items - The list of items to score.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.

      • globalScore

        void globalScore(@Nonnull
               java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> queryItems,
               @Nonnull
               MutableSparseVector output)
        Score items in a vector based on a collection of items (a shopping basket).
        Parameters:
        queryItems - The items to use as the query.
        output - A vector whose key domain is the items to score.
        See Also:
        ItemScorer.score(long, MutableSparseVector)
